scripts.publish-beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta --git-tag-version false && npx webpack && cd build && npm publish --tag beta --access public
scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch --git-tag-version false && npx webpack && cd build && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor --git-tag-version false && npx webpack && cd build && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-major: npm version major --git-tag-version false && npx webpack && cd build && npm publish --access public
